text.text_translated: Julie Wong is a very important researcher. She studies robots and AI. AI helps computers to think. She wrote more than 50 papers. Sometimes she wrote them with other people. Her papers are in very good science magazines. Other scientists check the papers first. She often speaks at meetings for scientists in different countries. In 2012, she won the Simone Fielding award. It is a very important award. Julie lives with her family in a smart home. She made the plan for the house herself.
